job_history.role_name: Head, Information Technology and Information Center
job_history.work_description: Provide leadership and direction to the GMS Information Center - a collection of data scientists and analysts dedicated to the production of high-value analytics to support manufacturing.

job_history.role_name: Director, Supply Chain and Logistics Information Technology
job_history.work_description: Established supply chain technology direction for global manufacturing organization. Established the GMS Information Center - an organization dedicated to providing advanced analytical capabilities to support the manufacturing organization.
Responsible for managing the delivery efforts for the global COMET program, focusing on the procurement, employee expense management and eSourcing areas.

Responsible for a $15MM annual budget; 75 FTEs and 30+ offshore (mix of consultants and employees); adept at remote management with domestic staff in New Jersey, Tennessee, Delaware and international staff in Europe and Singapore.
Led the effort to implement SAP for the US Commercial operations of Schering - Plough.

job_history.role_name: Manager, Commercial and Field Force Systems
job_history.work_description: Led a team of developers implementing web-based solutions for support of Schering - Plough's field forces in the United States.
Led the implementation of outbound call center solutions for key operations in the Ohio call center.
Led the implementation of the Marketing and Client Services application for the front-office organization of the global bond operations.
Led the implementation of a new cash management system to support the treasury operations of Prudential.
Responsible for day-to-day support of PC hardware and software for the Prudential Help Desk.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in leadership roles, including heading the Information Center, directing supply chain technology, and managing large teams, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Has led numerous projects, including the implementation of SAP, COMET program, and cash management systems, demonstrating expert-level proficiency in project management.

skills.name: Supply Chain Management
skills.explanation: Has established supply chain technology direction and led efforts to implement SAP for US Commercial operations, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Data Analysis
skills.explanation: Has experience in providing high-value analytics to support manufacturing, suggesting strong proficiency in data analysis.

skills.name: IT Management
skills.explanation: Has managed large IT teams, including 75 FTEs and 30+ offshore staff, and has experience with remote management, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Budgeting
skills.explanation: Has managed a $15MM annual budget, suggesting strong proficiency in budgeting.

skills.name: SAP
skills.explanation: Has led the implementation of SAP for US Commercial operations and has experience with SAP Center of Excellence, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Software Development
skills.explanation: Has experience in implementing web-based solutions and has led teams of developers, suggesting solid working proficiency in software development.

skills.name: Call Center Management
skills.explanation: Has led the implementation of outbound call center solutions, suggesting solid working proficiency in call center management.

skills.name: Cash Management
skills.explanation: Has led the implementation of a new cash management system, suggesting solid working proficiency in cash management.
